User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0b11) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b11
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0b11) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b11

I define FF to start with the tab of the last session.
As firefox starts it start with the apps tab from last session,
but it is not refreshed - meaning if it was the CNN site u'll get the news of yesterday.

i think apps tabs should behaive like the old tabs of FF3.6 and the user  should not hit the refresh button in order to start.

I've tested this issue on a new, clean, fresh profile - it happend with all my profiles.

I wish apps tabs to act as a regular tab.
It is nice to have my favorite tabs to be shrink as a pin tab but I think it should behave first of all as a tab.
